tool_description: Detects spatial conflicts between fixtures, utilities, structural elements, and clearance zones to ensure all components fit without interference.

fixture_positions.description: List of fixtures with positions: toilet:x,y vanity:x,y shower:x,y

utility_routes.description: Utility paths: plumbing, electrical, ventilation routes

door_swing_area.description: Door swing zone [x1, y1, x2, y2] in feet

error_messages: Invalid fixture position format: Use fixture_name:x,y format with numeric coordinates.
Invalid utility route format: Provide utility paths as descriptive strings.
Invalid door swing area: Provide four coordinates defining rectangular area.
Collision detected: Fixtures or utilities overlap with each other or structural elements.
Clearance violation: Required clearance zones are blocked by other elements.
usage: Input all fixture positions, utility routes, door swing area, and structural elements. The tool identifies any spatial conflicts and suggests resolutions.

collision_count.description: Total number of spatial conflicts detected

collision_details.description: Detailed description of each collision found

clearance_violations.description: Areas where required clearances are not maintained

layout_viability.description: Overall layout assessment: viable, needs-adjustment, or problematic
